This connector is now DEPRECATED.


To upload CSV files from your local machine or network to Domo, use our [File Upload connector](..\file_upload_connector\index.html "File Upload Connector").


To upload CSV files to Domo from an external SFTPÂ server, useÂ either our [CSV Advanced Connector](..\csv_advanced_connector\index.html "CSV-SFTP Connector").


To upload CSV files to Domo using Domo's own SFTP server, use theÂ [CSV SFTP Push Connector](..\csv_sftp_push_connector\index.html "CSV SFTP Push Connector").


To upload CSV files to Domo from a website, use theÂ [CSV Advanced Connector](..\csv_advanced_connector\index.html "CSV Advanced Connector").


To upload CSV files to Domo from a third-party service, use the connector corresponding to that service, such as [Amazon S3](..\amazon_s3_connector\index.html "Box Connector"), etc.
